title: Modern San Serif Swash font
content:
Anybody know this font or a similar font to this? The attached photo is of the turner prize display done by APFEL who say it is custom made however dazed and confused also use something similar in their spreads.

Thanks!

| --- | --- |
| [Picture 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20110426120019/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_196.png) | 21.55 KB |
author: iheartfinn

comments.content: It kind of reminds me of [Estilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20110426120019/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/estilo/fonts/).
